description: Blonde and bendy beauty Lisey Sweet has booked some private yoga lessons for herself and her boyfriend, the muscular stud Draven Navarro. Their instructor is the tall and handsome Zeke the Freak, a man who knows the importance of breathing and stretching before testing your limits. Draven gets bored of the gentle and contemplative exercise and decides to have a little fun with Zeke, pressing his face into Zeke's cock through his yoga pants and grinding on him while he corrects his form. Lisey is annoyed that her bisexual beau isn't taking the lesson seriously, but the idea of sharing the lithe and lusty yogi with her man in a bisexual three way is too sexy to turn down. The trio fuck, suck, lick and kiss their way through some specialized positions that will have your mouth watering and your chakras spreading wide open.
title: Bending Both Ways
